text: "The Spirit of Radio" is a 1980 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It is the leading single from their seventh studio album Permanent Waves and went to number 51 in the United States, number 13 in the United Kingdom and number 22 in Canada. It has became one of their best known singles and was a concert staple. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Art rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: The Spirit of Radio
